notes:
1.1.5 build 7

Fixed:

- Added support for bezier and hold keyframes in Effects Presets (animation curve will default to standard bezier curve)

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.5 build 5

Fixed:

- Apply transition didn't work in some cases

- Trim Out Point to Playhead didn't work for Graphic layers

- un-Solo Tracks didn't account for new tracks added when Solo mode was enabled

- Export Selected Clips by default didn't use sequence name for exported clip names

- On Windows, if Timeline panel was detached from main window (e.g. two monitor setup), Excalibur failed to perform following commands: Apply Transition, Premiere Pro nest, Paste clip, New Item -> Adjustment layer.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.5 build 1

New:

- Add/Remove keyframe for Position, Scale, Rotation, etc. Works like in After Effects. Adds keyframe at playhead. If there is a keyframe at playhead already, it will be removed.

Fixed:

- Undo command optimisation

- Non-english languages fixes

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.4 build 11

Fixed:

- optimised logic for interaction with Grave Robber

This version is needed to communicate with Grave Robber 0.6.0

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.4 build 10

Fixed:

- Apply Transition was broken in previous builds

- Export Media/Clips path didn't remember last path used in search bar

- Selection commands would select clips on locked tracks

- Add marker to Clip didn't account for clip speed changes

- Move Clip Start/End to Playhead command is optimised

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.4 build 7

Fixed:

- when Effect Preset was applied to Essential Graphics clip it added effect but didn't change values of it

- when Transform effect was applied to a clip its uniform scale checkbox was set to off

- better communication with external extensions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.4 build 4

New:

- Excalibur can control Grave Robber extension

Fixed:

- Excalibur requested to set shortcut keys for "Apply Default Video/Audio Transition"

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.4 build 1

Fixed:

- Optimized "Keypress Shortcut" both for macOS and Windows

- Optimized IME both for macOS and Windows

- Adjustmnet layer didn't work if Premiere Pro wasn't using English language

- After "Duplicate and Increment" new sequence didn't have focus

- Depending on media fps "Export Selected Clips" would export first frame of next clip after selected one

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.3 build 14

Fixed:

- Optimized "Paste on Same track"

- Old key codes on macOS will be converted to new ones

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.3 build 13

- Target/Mute/Lock/Sync Lock Tracks now use these subcommands:

- Target tracks (number input, targets specified tracks, additive behaviour)

- Toggle tracks (number input, toggles specified tracks, other tracks are untouched)

- Target tracks with selected clips (targets specified tracks, additive behaviour)

- Toggle tracks with selected clips (toggles specified tracks, other tracks are untouched)

- Target All tracks

- Toggle All tracks (same as native Premierer Pro command)

- un-Target All tracks

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.3 build 11

New:

- Target/Mute/Lock/Sync Lock Tracks now have possibility to input track numbers 

Fixed:

- Presets that used "Vector Motion" (part of Essential Graphics) added additional "Vector Motion" effect instead of changing values of existing one

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.3 build 10

New:

Sequence module

- Add Marker to Clip

- Target Video/Audio Tracks

- Mute Video/Audio Tracks

- Lock Video/Audio Tracks

- Sync Lock Video/Audio Tracks

Preferences module

- Snap in Program Monitor

Fixed:

- "Show Guides", "Show Rulers" don't work on Windows

- "Add Marker" renamed to "Add Marker to Sequence"

- "Solo Tracks" renamed to "Solo Mute Tracks"

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.3 build 7

New:

Preferences module

- Display Color Management

- Snap playhead in Timeline

- Selection Follows Playhead

- Linked Selection

- Transparency Grid (when Excalibur turns it off, it closes and re-opens active sequence, to refresh program monitor)

- Show Rulers

- Show Guides

Fixed:

- Select Clip Above/Below didn't work if there was an empty track on a way. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.3 build 6

New:

Selection module

- Select Clip Above/Below. Select clip on a track above/below selected clip at playhead position

- Extend Selection. Extends clips selection to left/right/up/down.

- Select All Clips after/before Playhead. Options: all tracks, all targeted tracks, all video tracks, all audio tracks, tracks with selected clips

- Select All Disabled Clips

- Invert Selection. Options: tracks with selected clips, all tracks, all targeted tracks, all video tracks, all audio tracks

- Multiply (*), divide (/), percent (%) operations added for position, scale, rotation, etc.

- Excalibur Settings could be open from a search bar.

Fixed:

- Copy Frame to Clipboard didn't work for some users

- Unnecessary undo step was performed for duration/speed/reverse commands when initially clip wasn't changed

- Optimizations for preloading of a search bar

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.1 build 9

New:

- Copy Frame to Clipboard

- Wait command (for User Commands)

- Duplicate and Increment, Increment and Save now have user command options. One can define how naming will look like.

- Date wildcards for Nest Clips

- Apply Transition doesn't need shortcut to be set in "Premiere Pro -> Keyboard shortcuts"

Fixed:

- If audio preset included change of volume, it won't be applied

- Film Impact transitions did't work: Light Leaks Impacts; Kaleido Impacts; Stripes Impacts; Chroma Leaks Impacts

- Optimizations for bigger timelines

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.1.0 build 11

New:

- Added dots for submenu commands in Excalibur Settings

Fixed:

- Multiple fixes for Undo command

- Multiple fixes for instant search bar on Windows

- Fix for search bar popping up when pressing multiple times shortcut assigned to user command (e.g. position add value)

- Fix for export presets defaulting to #1 option in User command on Windows

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
